p: Anti- Helicobacter pylori activity was assessed by an agar dilution method. The anti- H. pylori activity of the essential oil and thymol as its major constituent is summarized in Table 3. The essential oil showed significant inhibition of H. pylori (MIC = 20.4 µg/mL) whereas thymol inhibited growth of H. pylori only at substantially higher concentration (MIC = 150 µg/mL).
